name: colon1ks (1021 bytes)
description:
colon1k - strategy game

colon1ks is a colony strategy game in 1021 bytes for #pico8 - controlled with a mouse by lifting object (click), moving and then dropping. you have to build up a colony or more correct - you have to get as much ressources as possible.   

short description

you have to build up a colony. first you have to drop your house/headquarter.

 you can now move objects with the mouse. you click on something you wanna move. lift it ab by click and drop it by click somewhere else. you can also swap objects. 

after drop your headquarter you have to protect this headquarter against the zombies. zombies are destroying the walls and if they destroy your headquarter, you have to leave the country. 

you can now start to collect diamonds and flowers. you can also take water and irrigate the plants and get new flowers.

survive and get as much money as possible.

features:

- strategy mechanic (build up, collect, plan vs. zombies)
- procedural levels (endless)
- different tactics possible
